titleStmt.title: Two sermons The Christians comfort in his crosses, conducting him in the tempests of tribulation, to the happie hauen of heauenly tranquillitie. And the iudges, and iuries instruction. By William Est, Maister of Art, and preacher of Gods word.
titleStmt.author: Est, William, 1546 or 7-1625.

titleStmt.title: Two sermons The Christians comfort in his crosses, conducting him in the tempests of tribulation, to the happie hauen of heauenly tranquillitie. And the iudges, and iuries instruction. By William Est, Maister of Art, and preacher of Gods word.
titleStmt.author: Est, William, 1546 or 7-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho: Creede, for Arthur Iohnson, dwelling at the signe of the white Horse in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: "The iudges and iuries instruction" has separate dated title page; register and pagination continuous.
